word_mean: 萨罗，水杨酸苯酯：同phenyl salicylate

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...不变，往往有痒或烧灼感，以后发生色素沉着。麻疹样或猩红色样泛发性红斑、多形红斑、中毒性表皮坏死松解。水杨酸苯酯（phenyl salicylate）［萨罗（salol）］——麻疹样红斑。毛果芸香碱（pilocarpine）——痒丘疹，偶然发生风疹块及红斑。.
salner 萨尔纳, salol 水杨酸苯酯, salo 萨洛炼
salmine 鲑精蛋白salol 沙洛；柳酸苯酯salometer 盐分计；盐浓度计

means.word_mean: 1. a white powder with a pleasant taste and odor; used to absorb light in sun tan lotions or as a preservative or an antiseptic or a coating for pills in which the medicine is intended for enteric release
